title: New to League, Need Help!
body: Hey guys, I'm new to League and so far I'm loving it a lot. Still trying to find my go-to champions but I had a question: what are runes and how do they work?

replies.body:
It doesn't seem like we have anything too in-depth on our own, but Rift Herald put together a nice little article with links to individual runes that gives a pretty good breakdown! It might take a bit of reading, but it'd be a great way to familiarize yourself with them and how they can potentially interact with each other ^_^!

https://www.riftherald.com/lol-guides/2017/11/8/16624648/league-of-legends-preseason-guide-runes-leveling-blue-essence-patch-7-22

You pick a line that suits your champion/lane/build. You get its bonus and have a choice of 3 lines of traits. Pick the ones you like the most or seem most suited to you. You can't use the same 2 traits from a single line/likeness. One would trade out with something else. 

You get a second line with the main as more of a utility usage/ passive play boost. You will get a boost from the 2nd one also but you will only be limited to 2 lines from 3 lines of selection.

Theres a line for each role +1. Here's an example of my Healer Support page, but not every one will use the same thing. Its what suits you that matters. How you use it and if it works and you make it look good then you're OK.
